name: Cliffwatch
role_in_state: coastal sentinel and emergency ship-repair hub
economy_niches: drying/preparation of sea-magic reagents (algal salts, drift resins)
culture_adjustments: tide-strict timekeeping â€” tidal markers override communal clocks
watch-guilds outrank merchant houses in local prestige
voyage-oaths and lookout-offerings more elaborate than state norm
constraints: steep terrain limits heavy industry and large slipways
ritual magic consumption of scarce imported reagents
notes: network of watch-towers enforces tide-calendared signals
prefers refit/repair of coastal craft over constructing ocean-going hulks
